tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Crowns,Tooth Extraction,
review:
Dr. Sowmya has been nothing but professional. She identified the issues immediately and explained the procedure and the costs involved.  Am grateful for her diagnosis and regular follow ups. I have never had to wait for too long. 

The Doctor who did the RCT was also very professional and tried to make the process as painless as possible. I got another couple of teeth extracted the following month and again the doctor that did the procedure was very kind and tried to minimise the pain as much as possible. Dr Sowmya has been very kind and friendly through out the treatment. Will definitely recommend Dr. Sowmya and Glow Dental.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Explained the situation in detailed manner and helped me to get the overall idea about the procedure. Friendly and calm doctor in handling patients, overall experience was excellent.  She was ready to take time and calm down the patient and then carried out the procedures. Also answered each and every doubts/questions that we asked without hesitation. 
Job nicely done :) 
thanks doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Explained the complications and solutions in a clear manner.  Suggested some healthy way to keep the teeth strong.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sowmia is a very young and energetic doctor. Always she is keeping pleasing & friendly  nature. **** **** ****** ******* ************ Keep going on.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Not satisfied with the treatment given.They r giving only temporary fixes and not permanent one.Wasted my money.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: The doctor is so rude to my kid ,mostly kids will be in fear when they visit a dental clinic for the first time ,seems  Dr .sowmya  is not much trained to handle kids . They should assign a good doctor in  paedodontics to handle kids

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Excellent service. Suggest to have proper advance information to patients on the costs to be incurred

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are satisfied with the treatment .The explanation of treatment is understandable. The surgeon is very friendly and polite person.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Today my son had an issue with his tooth, so we came to see a doctor. They gave us an idea to remove the tooth.
They told us the advantages and disadvantages.
Accordingly, we removed the tooth today. He is still in treatment. No issues so far. If there is any issue, we will go and see a doctor. Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am getting treatment from this clinic for more than 3 years. All  the members are working as a team under the leadership of Dr. Gayathri. 

Dr. Sowmya did an excellent treatment within a short span of time where I have to rush back to Singapore.

I strongly recommend  Dr. Gayathri, Dr. Sowmya and their team for all sort of dental issues.

"KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK\
